title: Nutrition & Weight Management
description: NYU Langone doctors and registered dietitians collaborate to provide lifestyle-based, medical, and surgical approaches to weight management. Learn more.
cleaned_text: We use cookies and similar tools to give you the best website experience. By using our site, you accept our [ Websites Privacy Policy](https://nyulangone.org/policies-disclaimers/websites-privacy-policy). Our physicians and registered dietitians collaborate to provide lifestyle-based, medical, and surgical approaches to nutrition and weight management, driven by the latest research. We also specialize in treating conditions associated with [obesity](/conditions/obesity)—including [diabetes](/conditions/type-2-diabetes-in-adults). We can help you find a doctor.
